name: Fightmare Mission
overview: A shooter developed by John Hornsby using the Shoot 'em Up Construction Kit. On a remote planet in the galaxy, very dangerous life forms have developed. In fact they have the characteristics of being extremely hostile and of releasing toxic substances in contact with the atmosphere. Your task is to seek and destroy these life forms before they can poison the Earth! Released in Italy as Missione Plasmide in Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - big 100 (1987) and Super C64 e C128 n.23 (maggio 1988).
